#include <iostream>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin >> t;
    for(int i = 0; i < t; i++)
    {
        char code[1000000];
        cin >> code;
        int r = strlen(code);
        int a[r];
        memset(a, 0, sizeof(a));
        long long int cnt = 0;
        for(int i = 0; i < r; i++)
        {
            a[i] = cnt;
            if(code[i] == 'L')cnt++;
        }
        cnt = 0;
        long long int rez = 0;
        for(int i = r-1; i >= 0; i--)
        {
            if(code[i] == 'O')
            {
                rez += a[i]*cnt;
            }
            a[i] = cnt;
            if(code[i] == 'L')cnt++;
        }
        cout << rez << endl;
    }
}
